OpportunityPartner.name: OpportunityPartner
OpportunityPartner.description: This object represents a partner relationship between an Account and an Opportunity. An OpportunityPartner record is created automatically when a Partner record is created for a partner relationship between an account and an opportunity.

AccountToId.description: ID of the partner Account in the partner relationship.

IsPrimary.description: Indicates whether the account is the opportunityâ€™s primary partner (true) or not (false). Label is Primary.

OpportunityId.description: ID of the Opportunity that is in the partner relationship.

ReversePartnerId.description: ID of the reciprocal OpportunityPartner record in a partner relationship.

Role.description: The UserRole that the Account has on the Opportunity. For example, Reseller or Manufacturer.
